name: Worlds Apart VR Early Access
description:
Worlds Apart is an all ages physics based sandbox game about freeing a tiny galaxy with plenty of interactable toys and fun things to unlock along the way.

Simple to understand controls and movement make WA a fun and easy experience for everyone.

Story:

As a new recruit You are the pilot of a K-8 Cuff Droid; A simple maintenance droid normally meant to keep the peaceful area of Orbitaria tidy, But this time you have been booted up to investigate the mystery of its missing galaxy.

Dev Note:

In Worlds Apart you can either follow along on the adventure of unlocking your own tiny galaxy or just play around with some crazy interactive toys for endless fun, it's up to you the player on how you want to enjoy your playtime.

Summary:

Worlds Apart BETA is The flagship game from Gameshack Games, A single dev team striving to bring fun games that appreciate fun bugs instead of squashing them! 

Players: Solo

Platform: Oculus Quest 2
